      • readDistance

        protected double readDistance(String distProperty,
                  String distUnitsProperty,
                  org.noggit.JSONParser parser)
                       throws IOException
        Helper method to read a up until a distance value (radius, buffer) and it's corresponding unit are found.

        This method returns 0 if no distance value is found. This method currently only handles distance units of "km".

        Parameters:
        distProperty - The name of the property containing the distance value.
        distUnitsProperty - The name of the property containing the distance unit.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readPolygon

        protected Shape readPolygon(org.noggit.JSONParser parser)
                     throws IOException,
                            ParseException
        This method takes a polygon and makes a bbox from it NOTE: not currently used! polygon is currently implemented in: makeShapeFromCoords(String, List) We could add a 'strict' or 'leinent' mode that would try the best it can
        Throws:
        ParseException
        IOException
